pageContext.description: Damaged in two places on face. Socket is crushed.
pageContext.surface: Smooth, but not shiny like that of No.2, from which is also differs in colour, being much lighter in tint (+ much like the "nuance" known as Cafe au lait)
pageContext.collection: Harris Free Public Library and Museum, Preston,3
pageContext.site: England,Lancashire,Penwortham,About 1000 yards due west of Penwortham Church, during excavations for the Ribble Dock, Preston at depth of 19 feet in coarse gravel. 23 November 1885
